title: Create agent-console placeholder crate on crates.io
description: Publish a minimal agent-console crate to crates.io to reserve the name. The real app will be developed in a separate repository. This is just name reservation.

title: Implement auto-stop idle timer (60min constant)
description: Add AUTO_STOP_IDLE_SECS = 3600 constant to daemon. Daemon should auto-stop when no sessions are active for 60 minutes. Logic lives in the main event loop (reset on any session activity, shut down when timer fires). Split from acd-ojb which bundled this with actor model refactor. Configurability deferred to acd-jnd (P4).
close_reason: Implemented: idle auto-stop timer with AUTO_STOP_IDLE_SECS=3600 constant, merged to master

title: Add SessionStore::has_active_sessions() to avoid clone-all in idle check
close_reason: Added has_active_sessions(), updated idle_check_loop to use it

title: Rename auto-start to lazy-start in codebase
description: Rename all auto_start/auto-start references to lazy_start/lazy-start for consistency with the new design. Includes: connect_with_auto_start() -> connect_with_lazy_start(), comments, module docs, error messages. Related to acd-tz3 (wire lazy-start into hook handler).
close_reason: renamed all auto-start references to lazy-start across 4 files

title: Fix claude-hooks to use correct Claude Code hooks format
description: The claude-hooks library uses wrong format. Expected object-based format with event keys: { "hooks": { "Stop": [{ "hooks": [...] }] } } but library uses array format { "hooks": [...] }. Need to update settings.rs and related code to handle actual Claude Code schema.
close_reason: Fixed claude-hooks library to use correct Claude Code hooks format (object-based instead of array-based). Updated all test files including edge_cases.rs, performance.rs, and atomic_safety.rs.

title: Consider actor model refactor for daemon (deferred)
description: Amendment 2 in decision-amendments.md proposed replacing tokio::spawn-per-connection + Arc<RwLock<HashMap>> with single-threaded actor model + plain HashMap. After analysis, decided to defer: Rust type system already prevents data races, TOCTOU risk is marginal at <50 connections, and the refactor touches ~1600 lines across server.rs/store.rs/usage.rs. Revisit if: (1) actual concurrency bugs appear, (2) connection count grows significantly, or (3) lock contention shows up in profiling. See discussion in devlog.

title: Remove service install/launchd/systemd — lazy-start daemon
close_reason: removed service.rs, plist, systemd unit, CLI subcommand, and tests

title: Update E002 session code: verify session_id from JSON stdin
description: Verify session management code uses session_id from JSON stdin (not basename PWD). Check any hook script examples or test fixtures that use the old pattern. Scope: crates/agent-console-dashboard/src/ session-related code. See docs/architecture/2026-01-31-decision-amendments.md and Q16.
close_reason: Verified: all hook scripts parse session_id from JSON stdin. Fixed stale $SESSION_ID $ARGS placeholders in daemon/mod.rs command templates. No code uses basename PWD.

title: Add cargo audit to CI workflow
description: Add a cargo audit step to .github/workflows/ci.yml. Checks dependencies for known security vulnerabilities (CVE database). Should run as a separate job alongside test/lint/docs.
close_reason: Closed

title: Add integration tests for claude-hook subcommand
description:
Automate the manual integration tests for `acd claude-hook`. These test the compiled binary with real stdin/stdout (no daemon running). Cases to cover:
1. Valid JSON with session_id → exit 0, stdout contains {"continue": true} with systemMessage (daemon not running)
2. Malformed JSON → exit 2, stderr contains error message
3. Valid JSON missing session_id field → exit 2
4. Valid JSON with extra unknown fields → exit 0 (forward-compatible)

Use cargo integration test pattern (`tests/` directory) with `assert_cmd` or `std::process::Command` to invoke the built binary. See existing test patterns in the crate.
close_reason: Integration tests added and bugs fixed in PR #2

title: Rename cargo package agent-console to agent-console-dashboard
description: Package name 'agent-console' doesn't match repo name 'agent-console-dashboard' or directory 'crates/agent-console-dashboard/'. Rename package to 'agent-console-dashboard', update lib name to 'agent_console_dashboard', and update all imports. Binary stays 'acd'.
close_reason: Package renamed to agent-console-dashboard across Cargo.toml, lib name, all imports, runtime paths, service identifiers, and plist file

title: Verify hook scripts exist at referenced paths
description: Daemon references /path/to/hooks/*.sh but scripts may not exist. Check if E006 (S006) created these scripts and update paths if needed.
close_reason: Obsolete: shell hook scripts deleted, replaced by plugin system (acd-a81)

title: closed flag is a one-way latch — no reverse path on re-activation
description: set_status(Closed) sets closed=true, but set_status(Working) does not reset it to false. A re-activated session has status=Working but closed=true, causing incorrect active/closed counts in STATUS and DUMP commands. Needs decision: either clear closed on non-Closed transitions, or prevent re-activation of closed sessions.
close_reason: Fixed: self.closed now derived from new_status on every transition

title: Migrate ACD to Claude Code plugin system
description: Replace manual hook management (daemon/hooks.rs + claude-hooks crate) with the official Claude Code plugin system. ACD would ship as a plugin with hooks declared in hooks/hooks.json. Claude Code handles install/update/uninstall lifecycle. This eliminates daemon/hooks.rs (610 lines), the registry system, and the claude-hooks dependency from ACD. The claude-hooks crate can be archived or kept for types only. See discussion in acd-in9 merge session.
close_reason: Migrated to Claude Code plugin system: build.rs generates plugin manifest, claude-hook subcommand replaces shell scripts, removed daemon/hooks.rs (610 lines) and claude-hooks dependency

title: Handle stale sessions from crashed clients (session TTL or heartbeat)
close_reason: Inactive session detection with visual treatment (dimmed DarkGray + ◌ symbol). No auto-close — sessions stay in active list, distinct from closed. has_active_sessions excludes inactive to fix daemon idle timeout.

title: Auto-install git hooks via build.rs
description: Add hook installation logic to build.rs. On cargo build, create symlinks from .git/hooks/{pre-commit,pre-push} to scripts/{pre-commit,pre-push}.sh. Skip if NO_INSTALL_HOOKS=1. Warn but don't overwrite foreign hooks.
close_reason: Closed

title: Wire TUI resurrect keybinding to daemon RESURRECT IPC command
description: TUI app.rs:249 has a TODO: pressing 'r' on a closed session produces Action::Resurrect but doesn't send the RESURRECT IPC command to the daemon. The daemon handler (handle_resurrect_command) and CLI command (acd resurrect) already work — just the TUI wiring is missing.

title: Investigate AskUserQuestion hook behavior in Claude Code
description: Verify whether AskUserQuestion triggers any Claude Code hook (PreToolUse, Notification, etc). If it does, determine if it causes duplicate status updates. Log both JSON stdin session_id and CC_SESSION_ID env var, compare if they differ. Track across Claude Code versions.

title: Deep content audit of all 55 story files
description:
## Context

Structural audit completed on 2026-01-30 (see docs/audits/2026-01-30-story-structural-audit.md).
All files pass structural validation (docs/docs-scripts/validate-stories.sh).
This task covers the CONTENT quality review that was not yet done.

## Branch

Continue on: docs/create-missing-stories

## What to Check Per Story File

For each of the 55 story files in docs/stories/:

1. **Description quality**: Clear user story format ("As a..., I want..., So that...")
2. **Context section**: Explains WHY this story exists, not just WHAT
3. **Implementation Details accuracy**: Files to modify/create match actual codebase structure
   - Check paths like `src/daemon/server.rs` vs `crates/agent-console-dashboard/src/daemon/server.rs`
   - Flag any paths that reference non-existent modules
4. **Acceptance criteria**: Testable, specific, not vague
5. **Dependencies**: Cross-references to other stories are accurate (correct story IDs, correct relationship)
6. **Scope consistency with epic**: Story scope matches what the parent epic describes
7. **Points estimation**: Reasonable relative to other stories (1=trivial, 2=small, 3=medium, 5=large)
8. **Code examples**: If present, check they use correct crate/module names
9. **Out of scope**: Items listed make sense and aren't things that should be in scope

## Approach

1. Read stories in epic order (E001 stories first, then E002, etc.)
2. Read the parent epic first to understand goals
3. Review each story against the checklist above
4. Record findings per file in docs/audits/2026-01-30-story-content-audit.md
5. Fix issues found
6. Commit fixes

## Already Verified (Do NOT Re-check)

- File existence (all present)
- Header format (Story ID, Epic link, Status, Priority, Points)
- Required sections present (Description, Acceptance Criteria)
- Epic links resolve to correct files
- Epic story tables have hyperlinks
- Sprint-status.yaml alignment
- Story ID matches filename

## Key Files

- Validation script: docs/docs-scripts/validate-stories.sh
- Structural audit: docs/audits/2026-01-30-story-structural-audit.md
- Sprint status: planning-artifacts/sprint-status.yaml
close_reason: Content audit complete. First pass fixed 37 files (paths, E009 rewrite, stale refs). BMAD second pass scored 94% — 49/55 stories implementation-ready, 4 medium + 6 minor AC specificity issues remain.

title: Update E009/E011 integration: daemon fetches usage, not TUI
description: Code changes needed: TUI should no longer call claude_usage::get_usage() directly. Instead, daemon fetches every 3 minutes and broadcasts via subscription. Update any TUI code that imports claude-usage crate directly. Scope: crates/agent-console-dashboard/src/. See docs/architecture/2026-01-31-discussion-decisions.md D3-D4.
close_reason: UsageFetcher wired into daemon, SUB extended with USAGE messages, TUI receives and stores usage data

title: Investigate usage fetch timer alignment and rounding
description: Investigate potential mismatch between 3-minute fetch interval and API tracking window rounding. When displayed percentages are rounded, they may fall into adjacent 3-minute buckets. Also consider: (1) fetch interval vs tracking interval alignment, (2) how many active TUIs affect fetch behavior (currently: fetch only when >=1 TUI subscribed), (3) edge cases when TUI connects mid-interval. Related: D4 in docs/architecture/2026-01-31-discussion-decisions.md

title: Make AUTO_STOP_IDLE_SECS configurable via config.toml
description: Currently AUTO_STOP_IDLE_SECS is a hardcoded constant (3600). Allow overriding via [daemon] section in config.toml as an integer (seconds). No env var needed — this is stable config, not per-invocation.

title: Add uninstall command for agent-console-dashboard system
description: Offer an option to fully uninstall the ACD system: remove hooks from Claude Code settings.json, remove service files (launchd/systemd), remove config files, remove socket file. Should be accessible via 'acd uninstall' CLI command.

title: Update E001 daemon code: auto-stop 60min + actor model
description: Code changes needed after epic amendments: (1) Update AUTO_STOP_IDLE_THRESHOLD_SECS from 1800 to 3600 in daemon code, (2) Refactor connection handling from tokio::spawn per connection to single-threaded actor model with mpsc queue, (3) Replace Arc<RwLock<HashMap>> with plain HashMap. Scope: crates/agent-console-dashboard/src/daemon/. See docs/architecture/2026-01-31-decision-amendments.md amendments 1-2.
close_reason: Split into focused issues: acd-2co (P1, idle timer implementation), acd-jnd (P4, configurability), acd-51l (P4, actor model deferred). Code audit found no deadlocks possible, one inconsequential TOCTOU. Current RwLock model is idiomatic Rust and correct for our scale.

title: Republish claude-hooks v0.1.1 with two-layer safety
description: Changes after initial publish (two-layer safety check) are not on crates.io yet. Bump version to v0.1.1 and republish.
close_reason: Published v0.1.1 with serial group fix

title: Replace silent "." fallback when cwd is absent from hook JSON
description: When Claude Code hook JSON has no cwd field, run_set_command defaults to "." which resolves relative to the daemon's cwd, not the session's. This is semantically wrong — resurrection validation would pass incorrectly, and the dashboard shows useless "." as working dir. Needs design decision: use "unknown" sentinel, log a warning, or require cwd.
close_reason: Fixed: uses <unknown> sentinel + stderr warning instead of silent .

title: Handle Claude Code hook JSON schema versioning
description: Document the current Claude Code hook stdin JSON schema and the Claude Code version we support. Add version detection or a dispatcher if the JSON format changes in future Claude Code versions. Current schema has: session_id, transcript_path, cwd, permission_mode, hook_event_name. Event-specific: Stop has reason, UserPromptSubmit has user_prompt.

title: Wire lazy-start into claude-hook handler
description: run_claude_hook_command() uses raw UnixStream::connect() via run_set_command(), bypassing the existing connect_with_auto_start() in client/connection.rs. The auto-start infrastructure (spawn daemon + exponential backoff retry) is built but not wired into the hook path. Fix: make the hook handler use connect_with_auto_start() so the daemon starts automatically on first hook trigger.
close_reason: Wired connect_with_lazy_start() into run_claude_hook_async(), daemon now auto-starts on first hook trigger

title: Add pre-push hook with cargo doc and cargo test
description: Create scripts/pre-push.sh that runs RUSTDOCFLAGS='-D warnings' cargo doc --workspace --no-deps --quiet and cargo test --workspace. build.rs installs the symlink alongside pre-commit.
close_reason: Closed

title: Add --claude-path flag to acd service install
description: Allow specifying the Claude CLI path instead of assuming it is on PATH. Over-engineering now, stored as a future idea for when we support multiple agent CLIs.

title: Fix dead code warnings for unused hook functions
description: cleanup_existing_acd_hooks() and uninstall_acd_hooks() are unused. Either keep for future 'acd uninstall-hooks' CLI command or add #[allow(dead_code)] with comment explaining why.
close_reason: Obsolete: daemon/hooks.rs deleted entirely in plugin migration (acd-a81)

title: Remove unnecessary inner mod wrapper in claude_hook integration tests
description: tests/claude_hook.rs wraps everything in mod claude_hook { ... } which adds indentation without namespacing benefit (test files are already separate crates). Removing it would simplify the file. Low priority style improvement.
close_reason: Closed
